1.title: Choice

11.content:
"Please Boberry! Let them go!"

Boberry was sitting cross-legged, reclining back on one arm, in someone’s home she had recently occupied. Although males in this universe were absolutely tiny compared to the females, all buildings including houses were built to the proportions of females. So she was able to fit quite comfortably in this house even though the owner was a male.

The owner of the home was a man named David McCullen who lived there with his 9 year old son George. They were both still in the house in a manner of speaking although now the lining of Boberry's stomach and a very thick layer of fat separated them from the outside world. David had a very good cell phone and was able to make a call to his oldest son Jim while sitting inside Boberry’s stomach.

Jim was now pleading with her to cough up his father and younger brother.

“I don’t really wanna let them go, but my you do look tasty” Boberry said in a fairly nonchalant manner, and she proceeded to pick him up and hold him in front of her rather beautiful face. She observed him for a moment, then licked her lips and opened her mouth widely to accept Jim.

“Wait! We can make a deal!” screamed Jim in desperation.

Boberry paid no mind to his shouts and stuffed him into her mouth closing her lips behind him. She then proceeded to suck on him and roll him around her mouth with her tongue, tasting him. The sensation, while not that unpleasant and even rather arousing in other circumstances (he was basically being “explored” by a giant beautiful woman’s tongue), was terrifying to Jim because it showed him that she thought of him as nothing more than a tasty snack. There was no fighting against her, he’d have to convince her to let him and his family go.

“I can get you more food!” he shouted, the sucking stopped and he sat in her mouth. Although males are a lot smaller than the females her mouth wasn’t particularly spacious, he certainly wouldn’t be able to stand on her tongue without bending to avoid the roof of her mouth. He waited there for a few minutes, as she thought about his statement. After the first few seconds she started sucking on him again and rolling him around in her mouth with her tongue, but it was less constant and far more slow than before and it seemed to be that she was doing it absent mindedly as she pondered what to do. Eventually mouth opened, light passed through her lips and she pushed him out with her tongue. He fell slightly and landed in the palm of her hand. Jim looked up to see her beautiful face staring at him.

“Okay, you’ve got my attention. I’d like more snacks, my only questions are who? And how?” she asked him.

“I can trick people into coming to you, I’m sure you can get people on your own but you wouldn’t have to seek them out anymore.”

“Hmmm, prove it, bring me six people to eat, men, teenagers, children, I don’t care but bring me six.”

The fact that she was perfectly happy with eating children was disturbing, but not overly surprising since she ate his little brother, “Why six may I ask?”

“Two for your father, two for your brother, and two for you”

“I see, alright, I’ll be back, any time limit?”

“Nope take as long as you want, but be aware I’m not coughing up your father and brother till I get those replacements so you don’t wanna take too long.”

Great, he thought. Okay, where to start. Six people, well I can get four from that group of bullies that used to pick on me, I think they hang out in a nearby alley. That’d be enough for my father and brother, and then I can try and find two others. Or there are the Robinsons who live next door. A father, and five sons, that’s enough to get all of us out of being Boberry’s meal, but the Robinsons are so nice they’ve never done anything wrong. What should I do?

112.content:
“Right this way Mr. Robinson!” Bill called out as he led the Robinson family up the path towards his house. He felt guilty but he really had no other choice.

Boberry heard this and got up to look out of the window, each step she took sent a ripple up her thighs which jiggled the rest of her body. She looked out to see Bill leading 6 men to the house. There was a middle-aged man, a young man who looked to be in his very early twenties, one who looked to be in his late teens, two who seemed to be in their mid-teens, and finally what looked like a preteen.

Well it seems he delivered after all, she thought to herself as she licked her lips. She then started to hack and cough into her hand until two men came tumbling out of her mouth and into her palm.

“I am a woman of my word,” she said to them both, “Help Bill entertain his guests and tell him to send them one at a time to the kitchen, which is where I’ll be waiting.” With that, she put them on the ground and walked over to the kitchen, her steps causing heavy thuds and vibrations as her massive weight impacted the floor.

The small, man-sized door next to the larger, woman-sized door swung open and Bill came in with the Robinsons. Bill was relieved at the sight of his father and brother but was also suspicious as to Boberry’s whereabouts. That was until his father pulled him aside and quickly whispered Boberry’s instructions to him. Bill nodded and then turned to the family behind him.

“Well guys, welcome to our home! Please make yourselves comfortable in the living room while I head into the kitchen.”

“Do you want any help or company while you go?” said the eldest son, who was in his early twenties.

“Yes thank you Harry,” Bill smiled, hiding his dark guilty thoughts, as he proceeded to lead Harry to the kitchen.

From the living room, they all heard a quickly stifled yelp and then silence. About a minute passed and then; BUUURRRRPPPP! They heard a very loud belch.

“What on earth was that!?” Mr. Robinson called out.

12.content:
Three cops were chasing a criminal. He had robbed a convenience store and was now taking off down the street. The robber had some distance on the cops but luckily rounded a corner that they knew lead into an alley. They didn't have to worry now he was trapped.

When the cops ran around the corner they bumped into a very large foot. They looked up tracing the body from the foot they had just crashed into, to the thick meaty calf above it, to the even larger fat thigh, to the enormous belly, gigantic breasts, and finally to the face of the woman who they recognized instantly as Kennedy. The police had had many encounters with her before so they knew her when they saw her. Kennedy smiled and waved at the officers but did not say hello. Something seemed to be in her mouth, and it was moving. She raised a finger to indicate that they should hold on a second and appeared to start sucking whatever was in her mouth.

The cops sighed, it was clear what had happened. The thief had clearly ran into Kennedy just like them but unlike them, he didn’t have the “protection” of the law on his side.

Muffled shouts of protest started coming from her mouth and bulges appeared now and then in her cheeks, doubtlessly caused by desperate attempts to escape her mouth from the soon to be ex-thief. These sounds were followed by a gulp and the struggling form left her mouth and worked its way down Kennedy’s throat. Kennedy looked back at the cops and beamed with delight.

“Hello officers, I’m glad you’re here, now I don’t have to go all the way to the station to report a devoured man,” she said, still beaming.

“Please Kennedy, we didn’t see anything, you don’t have to report it, just this once don’t,” one of the officers pleaded with her. You see, the law doesn’t prohibit women from eating men, but it does ask that it be reported, for the sake of public records. Of the women who eat men, very few actually bother to report it, but Kennedy has discovered that there is a bonus in it for her if she does. Policemen are considered off-limits as far as eating is concerned and are usually safe. Kennedy however has discovered that if she is “unable” to identify whoever she’s eaten, then the police need to do it themselves, by getting a face-to-face admission from whoever the victim is. This requires one of the officers to go into her stomach. Now you may think that she would have to cough up the cop after the identification, but her personal rights by law state that she cannot be forced to cough up anything or anyone. As far as Kennedy is concerned, this means that with every person she eats, she gets a cop for desert.

The oldest of the cops was trying to negotiate their way out of this, not for his sake, but for the sake of his young rookie associates, both of whom were staring at Kennedy’s enormous belly, picturing the struggling thief. “Please Kennedy, these two guys have only just started out,” he said. He could always sacrifice himself but he wasn’t about to do that. If Kennedy wanted someone to eat there was no way it was going to be him.

“Hmmmm, let me think,” said Kennedy

1211.content:
Kennedy walks through her door, kicks off her shoes after a long day and leans back in a recliner to relax.

After a relaxed sigh she calls, “Boys!” A group of young men, ranging from 16 to 19 years old, climbed up some mini-scaffolding to get up to the recliner. “Hi boys,” Kennedy smiled kindly at them all and then started making a pouty face, “my feet are really aching.” Without hesitation they all ran down the seat of the recliner to her pudgy feet and started rubbing her feet (an impressive feat considering their size). “Ah, what would I do without you boys?” she mused. Then she leaned the seat all the way back, rested her head back, reached to a table next to her and rang a little bell. A pair young men, one being 19 and the other being 17, climbed up the scaffolding. One of them was carrying a wiggling bag on his back. They ran up the chair next to Kennedy’s head, which turned to face them.
“We’ve brought your snacks Miss!” The eldest exclaimed excitedly.

“Mmm – excellent work boys, you get them from the local school?”

“You bet!” The eldest of the boys opened the bag he had on his back and pulled out a young boy, who looked to be about 7 years old and was shaking with fear. The 19 year old said, “Open wide!” With that, Kennedy smiled, closed her eyes and opened her mouth wide. The child was tossed into her mouth and she proceeded to suck on him and swallow him whole.

“You didn’t bring one?” Kennedy asked the youngest of the two. As the eldest began to descend down the scaffolding.

“Sorry miss, I wasn’t able to grab anyone before your usual return time, and I didn’t want you to go hungry so I came back myself to feed you.”

“Aw that’s so sweet, pity you couldn’t find anyone though,” the boy looked disappointed in himself. “Aw now don’t look that way,” she placed a finger under his chin and lifted his head up, “I’m sure you’ll be delicious.” The boy smiled, the thought that he could still please Kennedy clearly cheered him up. “Now Jump in!” The young boy gleefully jumped into Kennedy’s open mouth. She savored his tasted and sucked on him like a hard candy.

Kennedy rested her head back once again. She thought of her current situation: feet being massaged by a group of love-struck teenagers, another one in her mouth, and a whole group of men and boys in her belly. This is the life, she thought.

131.content:
Bill heard the thumps of her feet coming towards him, he swung around when they were really close and looked up. He sees a familiar sight he thought he'd never see again, Britt's large foot coming towards him.

THUD!

Bill was pinned under Britt's enormous weight with only his head poking out from between Britt's big and second toes. Britt proceeded to play a game she used to play while they were dating, the aptly named "pretends she doesn't know she's crushing him" game.

Britt made a fake yawn while she continued to stand on top of Bill, "Sure is a nice place this, I wonder if I can still balance on one leg." With that, Britt raised her left leg, which unfortunately for Bill, wasn't the one he was trapped under. All of her immense weight was now applied to her right foot which, in turn, applied it to Bill. Luckily for Bill, the men of this world are extremely durable and can take a lot of punishment, unfortunately, they can still feel pain and having Britt stand on top of you is quite painful.

"Hmm, I guess I can still balance on one foot," she lowered her left leg again, "Oh hi Bill! I didn't see you there, hehe." Britt bends down and pries Bill out from under her foot. "I'm glad I saw you though, I would like to talk." With that she starts walking back to her chair and you notice a rather crushed looking form of another man on the chair, it was Gus, the guy who owns the house and invited you to the party.
